scripts.build: ng build ngx-pwa-local-storage && copyfiles README.md LICENSE dist/ngx-pwa/local-storage && npm run schematics
scripts.test: npm run unit && npm run e2e
scripts.unit:windows-latest: ng test ngx-pwa-local-storage --watch false --browsers ChromeHeadless,FirefoxHeadless && ng test ngx-pwa-local-storage --watch false --browsers IE --ts-config projects/ngx-pwa/local-storage/tsconfig.spec.ie.json
scripts.unit:windows-latest:private: ng test ngx-pwa-local-storage --watch false --browsers ChromePrivate,FirefoxPrivate && ng test ngx-pwa-local-storage --watch false --browsers IEPrivate --ts-config projects/ngx-pwa/local-storage/tsconfig.spec.ie.json
scripts.e2e: npm run webdriver && npm run e2e:demo && npm run e2e:interoperability
scripts.release:patch: VERSION=patch npm run release && npm run githubrelease
scripts.release:minor: VERSION=minor npm run release && npm run githubrelease
scripts.release:major: VERSION=major npm run release && npm run githubrelease
scripts.release: if test $VERSION; then npm run build && cd projects/ngx-pwa/local-storage && npm version $VERSION --git-tag-version false && git add package.json && cd ../../.. && git commit -m "release" && npm version $VERSION && npm run build && npm publish ./dist/ngx-pwa/local-storage --access public --tag ${TAG:-latest} && git push && git push --tags; fi
scripts.githubrelease: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^## $npm_package_version/,/^## /p" CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d') && gh release create v$npm_package_version --title v$npm_package_version --notes "$CHANGELOG"
